name: burned_computer_desk
html_content:
Museum Accident

Tragedy struck our tech exhibit: a vintage PC was partially destroyed in an unexpected incident. The charred remains of this once-prized machine serve as a stark reminder of how fragile even our most treasured pieces of history can be. While the damage is unfortunate, it highlights the resilience of our collection and the stories each artifact carries—even in the face of accidents.
image_description: a burned up old outdated computer sitting on a desk

expected.analysis_details: Image shows an outdated computer on a desk with visible hardware components. The surrounding text explicitly refers to this image as 'This image shows a classic example of early computing hardware' and discusses its historical significance in technology evolution.

name: flip_cellphone_icons
html_content:
Popular Mobile Phone Models

During the early 2000s, flip phones became incredibly popular for their compact design and ease of use. One notable model featured an innovative interface.

The device shown here demonstrates how users interacted with their phones, with visible icons on the screen providing access to various functions.
image_description: a flip cell phone that is open with icons being displayed

expected.analysis_details: Image displays an open flip phone showing screen icons. The surrounding text directly references this specific device, explaining its historical context and how users interacted with it through the visible interface icons.

name: refrigerator_outdoors
html_content:
Proper Appliance Storage Guide

When moving or storing large appliances, proper preparation is essential to maintain their functionality and longevity.

The refrigerator shown here demonstrates proper securing techniques for outdoor storage, with straps and protective coverings.
image_description: tied down refrigerator sitting outdoors in the sun

expected.analysis_details: Image shows a refrigerator tied down and exposed to outdoor conditions. The surrounding text discusses appliance storage techniques and explicitly references this image as demonstrating 'proper securing techniques for outdoor storage' with specific details about straps and coverings.

name: fire_hydrant_water_street
html_content:
Understanding Fire Hydrants

Fire hydrants are critical components of urban fire safety infrastructure. They provide emergency water access for firefighting operations.

This image captures a fire department training exercise where firefighters test the hydrant's functionality by releasing water into the street.
image_description: a fire hydrant spilling water into a street near a fire truck

expected.analysis_details: Image shows a fire hydrant releasing water near a fire truck during what appears to be training. The surrounding text explains hydrants as critical fire safety infrastructure and specifically references this image showing firefighters testing functionality.

name: park_benches_line
html_content:
Welcome to Our Community Park

Our park offers various amenities for visitors of all ages. One notable feature provides comfortable seating throughout the grounds.

The park features numerous seating areas where visitors can rest and enjoy the natural surroundings.
image_description: there are many benches that line this park

expected.analysis_details: Image shows multiple benches lining a park area. The surrounding text introduces the park and specifically mentions seating areas as an amenity, with the image caption explaining visitors can rest and enjoy surroundings.

name: mountain_trees_clouds
html_content:
Welcome to Your Customer Area

We’re delighted to welcome you to your personal space. Here, you can manage your information, track your activity, access your services, and enjoy all the features designed to make your experience simple, fast, and secure. Everything you need is just a click away. Welcome aboard!.
image_description: green trees on mountain under white clouds during daytime

expected.analysis_details: Image shows a scenic landscape with green trees on a mountain under white clouds during daytime. The surrounding text provides general welcome messaging about nature exploration without specifically referencing or describing this particular image. No caption or contextual information connects the image to the content.

name: icebergs_water_daytime
html_content:
Earth's Natural Wonders

Our planet is filled with incredible natural phenomena that inspire awe and wonder. One such spectacle can be seen in polar regions.
image_description: icebergs floating on body of water during daytime

expected.analysis_details: Image shows icebergs floating in water during daytime. While the surrounding text mentions polar regions and natural phenomena generally, it does not specifically reference or describe this particular image of icebergs. The image serves as a decorative element enhancing the visual appeal without conveying specific information.

name: moon_snow_mountains_painting
html_content:
Nature-Inspired Art Collection

This exhibition showcases how natural landscapes have inspired artists throughout history. Each piece captures the essence of its subject through various artistic techniques.

expected.analysis_details: Image shows a full moon above snow-capped mountains, resembling a painting style. The surrounding text discusses an art exhibition and nature-inspired artwork but does not specifically reference or describe this particular image. It serves as decorative visual content for the exhibit section.

name: flowers_field_sky
html_content:
Experience Seasonal Beauty

Visit our perfume gardens for an unforgettable experience.
image_description: white flowers field near body of water under blue and white cloudy sky

expected.analysis_details: Image shows a field of white flowers near water under a cloudy sky. The surrounding text invites visitors to experience seasonal garden beauty but does not specifically describe or reference this particular image. The image serves as decorative background content for the banner section.

name: person_forest_watching_dog
html_content:
Connect with Nature

Escape the city and reconnect with the natural world. Snow walks are perfect for reconnecting with nature, enjoying peaceful moments, and capturing stunning winter photos. Whether you prefer a gentle stroll or an adventurous trek, each step in the snow brings a sense of calm and wonder..
image_description: person standing on snow covered forest watching dog

expected.analysis_details: Image shows a person in a snowy forest with a dog. The surrounding text promotes outdoor adventures and nature connection but does not specifically describe or reference this particular image scene. The image functions as decorative hero content for the adventure section.
